QuestData.Title: Simulacrumble
QuestData.Description: <The shattered remains of an ancient mogu statue. This one looks like it never animated before it was broken.$B$BWhatever dark magic the mogu are employing here, it seems to make the brittle statues significantly tougher. Better to destroy them while they are still vacant.$B$BA good old-fashioned kick should do the job.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Kick 6 Vacant Destroyers in the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
QuestData.RewardText: <The statues topple and shatter with ease; a testament to the immense weight of the spirit.>
